title: Jake Tapper | Trump's 2019 State of the Union Address: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump's 2019 State of the Union address in which he attacked the investigations of his presidency and repeated his demand for a border wall.

Then. Seth talks to CNN's Jake Tapper, who also takes a few more questions backstage exclusively for this podcast.
